Articles.Content: There are RCS blocks and modules in the Silisko edition 2 which work quite well.
whats the progress with Probodobodyne?
He\'s probably pretty wrapped up in experimentals right now for 0.15.

Experimentals aren\'t up yet.

Also, I think I found an error in the latest version of Bace, check the Mun landing gear description : I did\'nt knew those legs had oxygen and windows... Just a little thing, but you should correct this

Experimentals aren\'t up yet.

Also, I think I found an error in the latest version of Bace, check the Mun landing gear description : I did\'nt knew those legs had oxygen and windows... Just a little thing, but you should correct this

He hasn\'t done a couple of the descriptions yet.

I got a bug.

I had that bace plugin installed, and there are these debris that i can go into 'control' via the tracking station, but 'end flight' and 'Space Center' are unresponsive. Also, i don\'t know where the Persistant saves are located in .14. So........... :sos:

I like these BACE models !

The Inflatable Module is a great device!!

Thanks, please keep up the good work.

Maraz

Just 2 pages back.

Oh, thanks!, i searched for it in this thread, but i must be going blind or something

Silisko, I know you gave up on the hinges because of Damned Robotics, but how about releasing them anyway for those who don\'t want to mess around with 'programming' the arms and such, and just want a quick fix?

Oh, thanks!, i searched for it in this thread, but i must be going blind or something

No problem at all!

Silisko, I know you gave up on the hinges because of Damned Robotics, but how about releasing them anyway for those who don\'t want to mess around with 'programming' the arms and such, and just want a quick fix?

Somewhat agree. I just want small hinges for my probes and .5m rockets. Though, honestly, I wouldn\'t mind if he just used r4m0n\'s pluging to power his models.
is there a 1.5m - 2m adapter or I\'m just missing something?

I\'d love a wee arm to reach out and poke another craft! It\'d be useful to... actually, don\'t know how it\'d be useful, but it would be nice to have them support fuel crossfeed and have folding nacelles.

Am I the only one who can\'t figure out how to make the Silisko Edition 2 fairing panels actually eject? Neither activating the panels themselves nor the decopuler they attach to seems to work. Does anyone know what I\'m doing wrong?
Frenchie - there\'s a fairing panel that\'s also a decoupler. You need to have that staged before the decoupler that you attached the fairings to in order to have them eject properly.
It is about half the height of the others.

By the way, your new textures looked great in the teaser thread, Nova.

Side note: I retextured your probodobodyne fuel tank to show why I was curious about the possibility of .5m parts in the future of SE2:

And I know it\'s come up before, if anyone wants to modify the probodobodyne fuel tanks to be side-mountable, just throw this in the config file:


node_attach = 0.0, 0.0, -2.665, 0.0, 0.0, 1.0, 1
attachRules = 1,1,1,1,0
How do i deploy solar panels on bace pack ???
They deploy when the stage they are on is activated.

I decided I wanted to split my probes in half. I also decided I wanted to keep this thread from stagnation.

Now I all I need is the premission of mighty probe god, Sillisko, to release it! =P

(It\'s a decoupler.)
Sure, go ahead!
I could also need some (modified) probodobodyne parts for my plugin (if it doesn\'t directly run over to BACE).

Sure, go ahead!

Thanks! Lemme just make a longer version to cover engines with. It should be up soon.

Longer version isn\'t coming any time soon. But in the mean time, I finished the small one!

Let me know if you have any problems with it.

Thanks! Lemme just make a longer version to cover engines with. It should be up soon.

Longer version isn\'t coming any time soon. But in the mean time, I finished the small one!

Let me know if you have any problems with it.

This is the best thing since lemons.

This is the best thing since lemons.
